attributes.action: Override any moves to give an amnesty to illegal immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have too any immigrant problems in the UK without adding to them. Custodial sentence should be the order of the day and extended to include failed asylum seekers.  THIS PETITION IS THE OPPOSITE OF THE LINK RELATED TO 'GRANTING AN AMNESTY'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
